metadata.title: DPM visits MOFAâ€™s operation room to monitor Pakistan-India relations

content.article_body: ISLAMABAD, Apr 25 (APP):Deputy Prime Minister and Foreign Minister Senator Mohammad Ishaq Dar Friday visited the Operations Room, established at the Ministry of Foreign Affairs, to monitor the developments in Pakistan-India relations. The DPM interacted with the officers on duty and appreciated their vigilance and preparedness.
